metadata.security_note: DO NOT COMMIT THIS FILE TO GIT

google_maps.verification: Correct format - this is a valid Google Maps API key
google_maps.confirmation: YES, this is the RIGHT Google Maps API key ✅
google_maps.usage: Converts addresses to coordinates and extracts county/city information

openrouter.where_to_use: Create OpenRouter credential in n8n, then reference credential ID
openrouter.note: Don't put raw API key in env var - create credential first

usage: EMAIL_FROM - sender address for property research reports
Google Drive OAuth - connect to store reports
Gmail OAuth - send emails (if using Gmail SMTP)

after_creating_credentials_in_n8n.SUPABASE_CREDENTIAL_ID: Create Supabase credential in n8n first, then paste ID here
after_creating_credentials_in_n8n.OPENROUTER_CREDENTIAL_ID: Create OpenRouter credential in n8n first, then paste ID here
after_creating_credentials_in_n8n.GOOGLE_DRIVE_CREDENTIAL_ID: Create Google Drive OAuth in n8n first, then paste ID here
after_creating_credentials_in_n8n.SMTP_CREDENTIAL_ID: Create Gmail OAuth in n8n first, then paste ID here

supabase.name: Supabase - Syntora Automation

configuration.note: Use SERVICE ROLE key, not anon key (n8n needs full database access)

supabase.after_creating: Copy the credential ID and set SUPABASE_CREDENTIAL_ID environment variable

openrouter.name: OpenRouter - CRE Research
openrouter.after_creating: Copy the credential ID and set OPENROUTER_CREDENTIAL_ID environment variable

google_drive.name: Google Drive - Report Storage

configuration.oauth_setup: Follow n8n's OAuth setup wizard - it will guide you through Google OAuth consent

google_drive.after_creating: Copy the credential ID and set GOOGLE_DRIVE_CREDENTIAL_ID environment variable

gmail_smtp.name: Gmail - Report Emails

configuration.oauth_setup: Follow n8n's OAuth setup wizard for Gmail

gmail_smtp.after_creating: Copy the credential ID and set SMTP_CREDENTIAL_ID environment variable

google_maps_api_verification.question: Is AIzaSyBkxRS17XbTj7nWsSPP7v_jODsp3x_Fndw the right Google Maps API key?

verification_details.screenshot_confirmation: ✅ Matches the key shown in your screenshot
verification_details.api_enabled: Geocoding API is enabled for this key
verification_details.usage: This key will geocode addresses and extract county/city information

apis_to_enable: Geocoding API (should be enabled based on screenshot)

recommended_limits.description: Set API quotas to prevent unexpected costs
recommended_limits.note: For 10 properties/day, you'll use ~10 requests/day (very low usage)

setup_status.next_step: Create credentials in n8n and set environment variables

security_reminder.critical: DO NOT commit this file or .env.example with real API keys to git
security_reminder.in_n8n: Environment variables in n8n are securely stored and not exposed in workflow exports
